name: shared_regret
prompt: Every person wakes up sharing someone else’s worst regret. Write a short account from two strangers who realize they have swapped.
decoded:
I woke up to the sound of my mother's voice telling me that I had forgotten to do my homework. I was going to get in trouble. I was going to be grounded for a month. I was going to lose my allowance. I was going to lose my friends. I was going to lose my life.

I woke up to the sound of my father's voice telling me that I had forgotten to do my homework. I was going to get in trouble. I was going to be grounded for a month. I was going to lose my allowance. I was going to lose my friends. I was going to lose my life.

I looked around and saw a stranger beside me. I looked at the stranger and saw my face. I looked at the stranger and saw my hair. I looked at the stranger and saw my clothes. I looked at the stranger and saw my shoes. I looked at the stranger and saw my life.

I looked around and saw a stranger beside me. I looked at the stranger and saw my face. I looked at the stranger and saw my hair. I looked at the stranger and saw my clothes. I looked at the stranger and saw my shoes. I looked at the stranger and saw my life.
